name: df-redunds
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(credunds, ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s1)), cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define the class of all redundant sets ` x ` with respect to ` y ` in ` z ` . For sets, binary relation on the class of all redundant sets ( ~ brredunds ) is equivalent to satisfying the redundancy predicate ( ~ df-redund ). (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 23-Oct-2022.)
